en.WELCOME_MSG: Hello! Welcome to LSF Room Service. What can I do for you?
en.WELCOME_REPROMPT_MSG: You can say for example, find a free room in building twenty two.
en.WELCOME_BACK_MSG: Welcome back. You have a reservation for the room {} from {} till {}. What else can I do for you?
en.HELP_MSG: You can tell me find a free room in building 22 or find a free room now in building 22, and I will ask further questions about the room and find suitable rooms for you at the end.
en.ERROR_MSG: Sorry, I couldn't understand what you said. Can you reformulate?
en.ERROR_TIMEZONE_MSG: I can't determine your timezone. Please check your device settings and make sure a timezone was selected. After that please reopen the skill and try again!
en.RESULT_MSG: I have found {} room for you. It is:
en.RESULTS_MSG: I have found {} rooms for you. They are:
en.NO_RESULT_MSG: Sorry! I couldn't find any rooms.
en.BUT_NO_RESULT_MSG: But sorry! I couldn't find any rooms.
en.RESERVE_MSG: Do you want to reserve any rooms?  (Please say Yes or No).
en.YES_RESERVED_MSG: Ok. I have reserved the room {} for the specified amount of time.
en.NO_RESERVED_MSG: Sorry. I could not reserve a room for you.
en.TEST_MSG: Here are the results. You can reserve a room if needed.
en.RESERVE_PROMPT_MSG: To reserve a room you can say for example, reserve a room in building twenty nine for two hours.
en.TRY_AGAIN: Do you want to try again? (Please say Yes or No).
en.INVALID_OPTION: Invalid option entry. There are only {} records. You need to enter a value less than or equal to the number of records.
en.USER_CANNOT_BOOK: But you cannot reserve a room. A reservation already exist in your name which expires only by {}.
en.NO_RESERVATION: Sorry, you donot have any reservations.
en.ERROR_RESERVATION_CANCEL: There was an error while cancelling your reservation.
en.CONFIRM_CANCELLATION: Do you want to confirm? (Please say Yes or No).
en.TOTAL_ALTERNATE_MSG: However, I have {} alternative for you. Do you want to see them? (Please say Yes or No).
en.TOTAL_ALTERNATES_MSG: However, I have {} alternatives for you. Do you want to see them? (Please say Yes or No).
en.NO_ALTERNATE_MSG: Unfortunately, I have no alternatives for you as well.
en.NO_MORE_ALTERNATE_MSG: Unfortunately, I have no more alternatives for you.
en.ALTERNATE_EQUIP_MSG: Ok. I have {} alternate room options in the same building for same time. But, {}.
en.ALTERNATE_EQUIP_MSG_SINGLE: Ok. I have {} alternate room option in the same building for same time. But, {}.
en.NO_ALTERNATE_EQUIP_MSG: Unfortunately, there are no alternate room options in the same building for same time.
en.ALTERNATE_BUILD_MSG: Ok. I have {} rooms available for same timings in different building.
en.ALTERNATE_BUILD_MSG_SINGLE: Ok. I have {} room available for same timings in different building.
en.NO_ALTERNATE_BUILD_MSG: Unfortunately, there are no alternate room options in different building for same timings.
en.ALTERNATE_TIME_MSG: Alright. I have {} rooms available in the same building for different timings, available for {} hours.
en.ALTERNATE_TIME_MSG_SINGLE: Alright. I have {} room available in the same building for different timings, available for {} hours.
en.ALTERNATE_TIME_MSG_DUR: Alright. I have {} rooms available in the same building for different timings, available for {} hour.
en.ALTERNATE_TIME_MSG_DUR_SINGLE: Alright. I have {} room available in the same building for different timings, available for {} hour.
en.NO_ALTERNATE_TIME_MSG: Unfortunately, there are no alternate room options in same building for nearby timings.
en.ALTERNATE_SEARCH_MSG: So then, do you want to have a fresh search right away? (Please say Yes or No).
en.CONTINUE_MSG: Would you like to continue to look for other search options? (Please say Yes or No).
en.NEW_SEARCH: Please consider doing a fresh search. Bye!
en.TIMEOUT_MSG: Sorry! The skill took too much time to respond.
en.TIME_ISSUE: You cannot book a room at this time. Please try booking the room between eight a.m and eight p.m.
en.TIME_EXPIRED: The entered time has expired. You need to try again from the beginning. Please say Yes or No if you want to start a new search.
